dict.string: We are going to Disney World. Which park do we go to first?
We arrive at Magic Kingdom and walk down Main Street. Which land do we go to first?
We go right and make it inside of Tomorrowland. Which ride do we ride?
I love roller coasters. I am so glad I started the day with one!
I enjoyed getting to ride around and watch everyone roam around Tomorrowland while I enjoy the breeze and relax!
We continue straight and walk through Cinderella’s Castle. We are now in Fantasyland. What ride do we ride first?
I am so glad I started our trip with such a classic ride like it’s a small world!
I know the wait times can get so long for Peter Pan’s Flight as the day goes on, so I am glad we knocked it out first!
We arrive at Epcot and are greeted with Spaceship Earth. Where do we head first?
I am starving and cannot wait to indulge in food around the World Showcase. Where do I want to eat lunch today?
I love beef tenderloin and ending my meal with a sweet dessert. Chefs de France was perfect.
I am so glad we had pizza at Vis Napoli. It was thin and perfectly crisp. And not too heavy for a day of rides!
We made it to The Land. What ride are we doing first?
Living with the Land is so peaceful and relaxing. I am glad we started our day here.
Soarin is so much fun, and it’s a family favorite. The lines can get long, but we got in early!
